name: Your Little Green Shop
description: Hello pizza fans! Are you a budding pizzaiolo? Buy a Caesars Pizza kit and cook your own authentic Margarita pizza at home. Great activity to do with the kids or with friends Only the freshest, tastiest ingredients! Pizza kits include:  2no dough balls 2no portions of san marzano tomato sauce 2no portions fior de latte mozzerealla cheese Some grated grano padano cheese Olive oil Fresh basil Small amount of flour/semolina for stretching the dough. Order through our Facebook store by Friday 12pm for a Saturday Pizza night or by Saturday 12pm for a Sunday Pizza night!
